revised_title: Investigation of Ficus Rubiginosa Resin and a New Homologue of Benzylic Alcohol
tldr: The authors investigate the properties and constituents of Ficus rubiginosa resin, discovering a new natural acetic ether homologous to benzyl. They also describe the physical and chemical characteristics of the resin and its constituents, including its solubility, color, and chemical reactions.
